title: Looking for casual Normal Play until i reach Lvl 30 [GER/ENG]
body:
Hello everybody {{summoner:31}} ,

Im looking for a group/players to play with until i get my account to 30. My Main got banned because of payment issues so i made a new one.
I main Support and played Jungle/Top/Adc aswell for 1 Year.
I just want to have fun and get my account to lvl 30 to join ranked.
Just add me and we can play :D

Bleed
